borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Erection of a rear extension at second floor level over part of the existing back addition; erection of rear extensions at ground and first floor level including a rear side infill extension at ground floor level; excavation of the front garden and lowering the floor level of the existing basement in connection with the enlargement of the existing basement, creation of a new bathroom and lightwell, enlargement of the front lightwell by replacing the existing window with new French doors and side glazing panels and erection of an external staircase from basement to ground floor level; erection of 2no dormer windows to replace the existing rooflights in the front roofslope; infilling of the existing rooflight and installation of 2no new rooflights above the main flat roof at roof level; re-location of 1no window to the side of rear back addition at first floor level; alterations to the roof of ground floor back addition; alterations to the rear fenestration at ground floor level to include the creation of a new external store with door opening; erection of a bin store at the front of the property.
